ModMetaData.name: RJWAnimAddons-AnimalPatch
ModMetaData.author: Tory187
ModMetaData.description: Load Order: Rimworld-Animations VoicePatch - if using XtraAnims - if using AnimalPatch Adds new animations used by all animals: -Animal --On Human ---Human Initiates ----Beast Cowgirl (by c0ffee) ---Animal Initiates ----Beast Doggystyle (by c0ffee) ----Humanoid Beast Doggystyle (by c0ffee, Tory187) --On Animal ----Beast On Beast Doggystyle (by c0ffee, Ranot) ----Humanoid Beast On Humanoid Beast Doggystyle (by c0ffee, Tory187) -Human --On Animal ---Human Initiates ----Beast Doggystyle2 (by c0ffee, Tory187) ----Humanoid Beast Doggystyle2 (by c0ffee, Tory187) ----Beast Oral (by IridiumX) ----Beast Muzzlefuck (by IridiumX) -Mech --On Human ---Mech Initiates ----Mech Doggystyle (by c0ffee, Tory187) Supports every animal in core and every mod that adds animals ever! Post on the AnimAddons thread on LL if you think that statement is a lie! (But seriously let me know if it's missing any animals)
